description: This table holds medication orders associated with the referral.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RFL_MED_ORDS_ID
columns.description: This item stores medication orders that are linked to the referral.
